name: BANXCHANGE
description: BANXCHANGE (BXE) is the native utility token on XRP Ledger of the BANXCHANGE decentralized exchange (DEX), built to offer fast, secure, and low-cost trading of digital assets. BXE is used for transaction fees, staking, governance, and ecosystem rewards. BANXCHANGE supports token swaps, liquidity provision, farming, and aims to become a leading multi-chain DeFi platform, the best DEFI on XRP Network.
